column1: Questions
column3: Excerpt of the Privacy Policy . In the case of multiple OSNs, We included excerpt from one policy

column1: What should be my minimum age to use the social media?
column3: You must be at least 13 years old to use our Services.

column1: What information I must need to provide to create the social media account and how long those information is being stored?
column3:
Example from Signal: To create an account you must register for our Services using your phone
number.

column1: What is the security mechanism the social media follows to keep my data secure?
column3: Signal utilizes state-of-the-art security and end-to-end encryption to provide private messaging andInternet calling services to users worldwide (“Services”).

column1: For which purposes does the OSN collect my location information?
column3: You may optionally add otherinformation to your account, such as a profile name and profile picture.

column1: Where does the social media store my video and photo?
column3: Your message history is stored on your own devices

column1: What kind of information does the OSN store about users? What information from third-parties can the OSN access that I did not provide?
column3: .....Additional technical information is stored on our servers, including randomly generated authentication tokens, keys, push tokens, and other material that is necessary to establish calls and transmit messages. Signal limits this additional technical information to the minimum required to operate the Services......

column1: Does the OSN access my contacts? if Yes, then for which purpose? What security mechanism they follow while storing my contact information?
column3: Signal can optionally discover which contacts in your address book are Signal users, usinga service designed to protect the privacy of your contacts. Information from the contacts on yourdevice may be cryptographically hashed and transmitted to the server in order to determine which ofyour contacts are registered.

column1: What personal information does the OSN store when I contact customer support? For what purposes can the OSN use that data?
column3: If you contact Signal User Support, any personal data you may share with us is keptonly for the purposes of researching the issue and contacting you about your case.

column1: How can I contact the customer center?
column3: If you have questions about our Privacy Policy please contact us at privacy@signal.org. Attn. PrivacySignal Messenger, LLC.650 Castro Street, Suite 120-223 Mountain View, CA 94041
column4: Currently out of scope of the OPPO, will be considered in the future.

column1: How will I get notified if the OSN changes any of its data practises?
column3:
We may amend or update our Privacy Policy. We will provide you notice of amendments to this Privacy Policy,
as appropriate, and update the “Last modified” date at the top of this Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy
Policy from time to time
column4: out of the scope of the current stage of OPPO. Notification mechanism

column1: Where does the social media typically store my message?
column3: ....your data is stored in data centers in the Netherlands. These are third-party provided data centers in which Telegram rents a designated space. However, the servers and networks that sit inside these data centers and on which your personal data is stored are owned by Telegram. ........

column1: If my message is unable to be delivered to the recipient, where the message is stored? How long?
column3:
If a message cannot be delivered immediately (for example, if the recipient
is offline), we keep it in encrypted form on our servers for up to 30 days as we try to deliver it.

column1: What security mechanisms are followed to store media information?
column3:
When a user forwards media within a message, we store that media temporarily
in encrypted form on our servers to aid in more efficient delivery of additional forwards.

column1: What security mechanism is followed by the social media in general?
column3:
We offer end-to-end encryption for our Services. End-to-end encryption means that your messages
are encrypted to protect against us and third parties from reading them

column1: How long my undelivered messages are being stored in the server?
column3: If a message is still undelivered after 30 days, we delete it

column1: What are the information the OSN collects in addition and how long they are being stored?
column3: Section: Automatically collected information

column1: Does the social media access my location if I choose not to provide it ?
column3: Even if you do not use our location-related features, we use IP addresses and other information like phone number area codes to estimate your general location (e.g., city and country)

column1: Why the social media collect my location information?
column2: Any OSN that collects location media information
column3: Example: We also use your location information for diagnostics and troubleshooting purposes.

column1: What types of my personal information does the OSN collect from other sources?
column3:
We receive information about you from other users. For example,
when other users you know use our Services, they may provide your phone number, name, and other
information (like information from their mobile address book) just as you may provide theirs.
column4: third party data recipient, data provider, information types

column1: How can I access my personal information?
column3:
Managing And Retaining Your Information
You can access or port your information using our in-app Request Acount info feature,

column1: How long my personal information is being stored and for which purposes?
column3:
Example:We store information for as long as necessary for the purposes identified in this Privacy Policy, including to
provide our Services or for other legitimate purposes, such as complying with legal obligations, enforcing and
preventing violations of our Terms, or protecting or defending our rights, property, and users
column4: Purpose, personal information type, duration description

column1: How the data storage duration is determined?
column3:
The storage
periods are determined on a case-by-case basis that depends on factors like the nature of the information, why
it is collected and processed, relevant legal or operational retention needs, and legal obligations.
column4: Currently out of scope of the OPPO, will be considered in the future.

column1: How can I modify my personal information?
column3: ...correct any inaccurate or incomplete personal data we hold on you........ to exercise rights, please contact our @GDPRbot......which we will answer at the earliest opportunity.......

column1: Can I delete my OSN account?
column3: ...ou may end these Terms with Signal at any time by deleting Signal Messenger from your device and discontinuing use of our Services......

column1: Which of my personal information will be removed after I request to delete my account?
column3:
When you delete your WhatsApp account, your undelivered messages are
deleted from our servers as well as any of your other information we no longer need to operate and
provide our Services. Deleting your account will, for example, delete your account info and profile photo,
delete you from all WhatsApp groups, and delete your WhatsApp message history.
column4: Data Erasure practice and information types

column1: Which of my personal information will still be available after I delete my account?
column3:
Please remember that when you delete your
account, it does not affect your information related to the groups you created or the information other
users have relating to you, such as their copy of the messages you sent them
column4: Data erasure practice , information types, storage practice, duration practice

column1: Why does the OSN collect information by cookies?
column3:
For example, we may use
information collected on other websites to show you
more relevant ads. Most web browsers are set to
accept cookies by default

column1: How does the OSN use my information collected from third-parties?
column3:
Advertisers, app developers, publishers, and other
third parties may share information with us as well. We may use this information, among other ways, to help target or measure the performance of ads.

column1: How does the OSN use the personal information provided by me?
column3: Section- How we use information: monitor, analyze, personalized, profiling, trends

column1: What are the contents that have no definite storage duration specified?
column3: **OSNs mostly do not discuss about the definite storage practices instead of describing sporadically they store certain contents as long as they need**

column1: What contents are stored for a maximum of 12 months?
column3:
Example: Other content, like Story posts, are stored for
longer

column1: How long does the OSN store my location information?
column3:
We store location information for diff erent lengths of
time based on how precise it is and which services
ayou
Snap — like those saved to Memories or posted to
Snap Map or Spotlight — we’ll retain that location as
long as we store the Snap

column1: How can I see the location data (or any data) retained about me?
column3: .. you can access your data from any of your devices anytime without having to rely on third-party backups.....

column1: How long does it take the OSN to delete my account?
column3:
Keep in mind that, while our systems are designed to
carry out our deletion practices automatically, we cannot
promise that deletion will occur within a specific
timeframe

column1: Why the OSN may retain my information after I request to delete my account?
column3:
Example: There may be legal requirements to store
your data and we may need to suspend those deletion
practices if we receive valid legal process asking us to
preserve content, if we receive reports of abuse or other
Terms of Service violations, or if your account, content
created by you, or content created with other users is
flagged by others or our systems for abuse or other
Terms of Service violations. Finally, we may also retain
certain information in backup for a limited period of time
or as required by law.

column1: How can I download the copy of my personal information collected and stored by the OSN?
column3: ....right to ...request a copy of all your personal data that we store and to transmit that copy to another data controller.... to exercise right please contact our @gdprbot....

column1: How can I request the OSN to limit the usage of my personal information?
column3:
In most cases, if you let us
use your information, you can simply revoke your
permission by changing the settings in the app or on
your device if your device offers those options.
column4: Data access, data minimization. Currently out of the scope of OPPO.

column1: Does the OSN use my information for advertisement purposes?
column3: ..We don't use your data to show you ads.....

column1: What information do I need to provide to OSN and how long the information is being stored?
column3: **Most of the OSNs describe what information they require and where they are stored in different parts of the policy**

column1: Where and how does the OSN store my information?
column3: ....your data is stored in data centers in the Netherlands. These are third-party provided data centers in which Telegram rents a designated space. However, the servers and networks that sit inside these data centers and on which your personal data is stored are owned by Telegram. As such, we do not share your personal data with such data centers. ......

column1: How can I delete my account?
column3: .......ou may end these Terms with Signal at any time by deleting Signal Messenger from your device and discontinuing use of our Services.........

column1: Why does the OSN collect my cookie information?
column3: ...only cookies we use are those to operate and provide our Services on the web....

column1: Does the OSN use my information for advertisement purposes?
column3: ..We don't use your data to show you ads.....

column1: Who has access to my credit card information ?
column3: ...We do not access and do not store your credit card information. When you save your credit card info, it is saved on the respective payment provider's servers and the payment provider........

column1: How long does the OSN store my photos?
column3: ...the personal data that you provide us will only be stored for as long as it is necessary for us to fulfill our obligations...
